item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! I am a graduate student at Yingling Research Group at NC State. My PhD research focuses on developing novel modeling method for ultra small nanoparticles and applying machine learning and nanoinformatics to optimize external magnetic field guided self assembly of nanomaterials. I’m proficient in large scale atomistic simulations and molecular modeling of magnetic and plasmonic nanoparticles. Thank you for visiting! My Google Scholar Profile Connect me via LinkedIn Follow me on ResearchGate
